sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_4f709aa82fb2330097f2f3ecf699b642
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.SR_ChangeRequest_LifeCycleManagement</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Script to call therequired event to send the notification inn Change Life Cycle Management</description><name>SR_ChangeRequest_LifeCycleManagement</name><script><![CDATA[var SR_ChangeRequest_LifeCycleManagement = Class.create();
SR_ChangeRequest_LifeCycleManagement.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},

	sendReminderNotifications : function(changeState){

		var changeStateMap = {
			"-4" : {
				"stateName":"Access",
				"reminderDuration":gs.getProperty("change.assess.reminderdays"),
				"eventToNotify" : "SR.Change.Reminder.Notify.Access",
				"queryDateField" : "start_date",
			},
			"-3" : {
				"stateName":"Authorize",
				"reminderDuration":gs.getProperty("change.authorize.reminderdays"),
				"eventToNotify" : "SR.Change.Reminder.Notify.Authorize",
				"queryDateField" : "start_date",
			},
			"-2" : {
				"stateName":"Scheduled",
				"reminderDuration":gs.getProperty("change.scheduled.reminderdays"),
				"eventToNotify" : "SR.Change.Reminder.Notify.Scheduled",
				"queryDateField" : "start_date",
			},
			"-1" : {
				"stateName":"Implement",
				"reminderDuration":gs.getProperty("change.implement.reminderdays"),
				"eventToNotify" : "SR.Change.Reminder.Notify.Implement",
				"queryDateField" : "end_date",
			},
			"0" : {
				"stateName":"Review",
				"reminderDuration":gs.getProperty("change.review.reminderdays"),
				"eventToNotify" : "SR.Change.Reminder.Notify.Review",
				"queryDateField" : "end_date",
			},
		};

		var query = (function getQuery(changeState){
			var plannedStartDate = new GlideDateTime(gs.nowDateTime());
			plannedStartDate.addDays(changeStateMap[changeState].reminderDuration);
			var query = gs.getMessage("state in {0} ^ {1} STARTSWITH {2}",[changeState,changeStateMap[changeState].queryDateField,changeStateMap[changeState].reminderDuration]);
			return query;
		})(changeState);

		var changeGR =  new GlideRecord("change_request");
		changeGR.addQuery(query);
		changeGR.query();
		while (changeGR.next()){
			gs.eventQueue(changeStateMap[changeState].eventToNotify,changeGR,'','');
		}



	},

	type: 'SR_ChangeRequest_LifeCycleManagement'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-07-19 07:29:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>4f709aa82fb2330097f2f3ecf699b642</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR_ChangeRequest_LifeCycleManagement</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4f709aa82fb2330097f2f3ecf699b642</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-07-19 08:12:47</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
